00026 double MonteCarlo::s_alpha;

00038 double MonteCarlo::s_fields_rec_sum;

00041 
00042 MonteCarlo::MonteCarlo(int num_threads)
00043     : 
00044     m_bTerminated(false),
00045     m_sec_cache_enabled(false),
00046     m_third_cache_enabled(false),
00047     m_sec_cache_firsttime(true),
00048     m_third_cache_firsttime(true)
00049 {
00050     int lsize = s_num_spins/16;
00051 
00052     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00053     #ifdef PACK_4FLOAT
00054         m_spins_real[site1].resize(spins_real_index(0,0,s_L)/4);
00055     #else
00056         m_spins_real[site1].resize(3*lsize);
00057     #endif
00058         
00059         m_field_pri_cached[site1].resize(lsize, 0.0);
00060         m_field_pri_cached_sane.resize(lsize, 0);
00061         for(int site2 = 0; site2 < 16; site2++) {
00062             m_field_sec_cached[site2][site1].resize(lsize, 0.0);
00063             m_field_sec_cached_sane[site2].resize(lsize, 0);
00064             m_field_third_cached[site2][site1].resize(lsize, 0.0);
00065             m_field_third_cached_sane[site2].resize(lsize, 0);
00066         }
00067         m_probability_buffers[0][site1].resize(lsize, 0.0);
00068         m_probability_buffers[1][site1].resize(lsize, 0.0);
00069     }
00070         
00071     fprintf(stderr, "# of spins = %d\n", 16*lsize);
00072     randomize();
00073 
00074     for(int i = 0; i < num_threads - 1; i++) {
00075         pthread_t tid;
00076         int ret =
00077             pthread_create(&tid, NULL, xthread_start_routine, this);
00078         ASSERT(!ret);
00079         m_threads.push_back(tid);
00080     }
00081 }
00082 MonteCarlo::~MonteCarlo()
00083 {
00084     {
00085         XScopedLock<XCondition> lock(m_thread_pool_cond);
00086         m_bTerminated = true;
00087         m_thread_pool_cond.broadcast();
00088     }
00089     for(deque<pthread_t>::iterator it = m_threads.begin(); it != m_threads.end(); it++)
00090     {
00091         void *retv;
00092         int ret = pthread_join(*it, &retv);
00093         ASSERT(!ret);
00094     }
00095 }
00096 void
00097 MonteCarlo::read(istream &is)
00098 {
00099     if(!is.good()) throw "input io error\n";
00100     string str;
00101     do {
00102         getline(is, str);
00103     } while(str[0] != '#');
00104     while(str[0] == '#') {
00105         getline(is, str);
00106     }
00107     int size;
00108     sscanf(str.c_str(), "size=%d", &size); 
00109     if(size != s_L) throw "size mismatch\n";
00110     is >> str;
00111     if(str != "[") throw "ill format\n";
00112     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00113         is >> str;
00114         if(str != "[") throw "ill format\n";
00115         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00116             is >> str;
00117             if(str != "[") throw "ill format\n";
00118             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00119                 is >> str;
00120                 if(str != "[") throw "ill format\n";
00121                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00122                     is >> str;
00123                     if(str != "[") throw "ill format\n";
00124                     is >> str;
00125                     int x = atoi(str.c_str());
00126                     if(abs(x) != 1) throw "value be +-1\n";
00127                     int sidx = spins_real_index(i1,j1,k1);
00128                     writeSpin(x, site1, sidx);
00129                     is >> str;
00130                     if(str != "?") {
00131                         int lidx = lattice_index(i1,j1,k1);
00132                         m_field_pri_cached[site1][lidx] = atof(str.c_str());
00133                         m_field_pri_cached_sane[lidx] |= 1u << site1;
00134                     }
00135                     is >> str;
00136                     if(str != "]") throw "ill format\n";
00137                 }
00138                 is >> str;
00139                 if(str != "]") throw "ill format\n";
00140             }
00141             is >> str;
00142             if(str != "]") throw "ill format\n";
00143         }
00144         is >> str;
00145         if(str != "]") throw "ill format\n";
00146     }
00147     is >> str;
00148     if(str != "]") throw "ill format\n";
00149 
00150     makeReciprocalImage();
00151 }
00152 
00153 void
00154 MonteCarlo::write(ostream &os)
00155 {
00156     if(!os.good()) throw "output io error\n";
00157     os << "# MonteCarlo calculation for pyrochlore. Kentaro Kitagawa." << endl;
00158     os << "# ver. 1.0." << endl;
00159     os << "# Spin configuration below." << endl;
00160     os << "size=" << s_L << endl;
00161     os << "[ ";
00162     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00163         os << "[ ";
00164         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00165             os << "[ ";
00166             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00167                 os << "[ ";
00168                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00169                     os << "[ ";
00170                     int lidx = lattice_index(i1,j1,k1);
00171                     os << readSpin(site1, spins_real_index(lidx));
00172                     if(m_field_pri_cached_sane[lidx] & (1u << site1)) {
00173                         char buf[31];
00174                         snprintf(buf, 30, "%.16g", m_field_pri_cached[site1][lidx]);
00175                         os << " " << buf;
00176                     }
00177                     else
00178                     {
00179                         os << " ?";
00180                     }
00181                     os << " ] " ;
00182                 }
00183                 os << "]" << endl;
00184             }
00185             os << "]" << endl;
00186         }
00187         os << "]" << endl;
00188     }
00189     os << "]" << endl;
00190 }
00191 
00192 void
00193 MonteCarlo::randomize()
00194 {
00195     fprintf(stderr, "Randomize spins\n");
00196     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00197         m_ext_field[site1] = 0.0;
00198     }
00199     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00200         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00201             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00202                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00203                     int sidx = spins_real_index(i1,j1,k1);
00204                     int val = (randMT19937() < 0.5) ? 1 : -1;
00205                     writeSpin(val, site1, sidx);
00206                 }
00207             }
00208         }
00209     }
00210     makeReciprocalImage();
00211 }
00212 MonteCarlo::Quartet
00213 MonteCarlo::siteMagnetization()
00214 {
00215     Quartet quartet;
00216     for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00217         for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00218             for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00219                 int sidx = spins_real_index(i1,j1,k1);
00220                 for(int trans = 0; trans < 4; trans++) {
00221                     int in = 0;
00222                     for(int site_wo_trans = 0; site_wo_trans < 4; site_wo_trans++) {
00223                         int site1 = site_wo_trans + 4*trans;
00224                         Spin spin = readSpin(site1, sidx);
00225                         quartet.sites[site1 % 4] += spin;
00226                         in += (spin == 1) ? 1 : 0;
00227                     }
00228                     quartet.twotwo += (in == 2) ? 1 : 0;
00229                     quartet.onethree += ((in == 1) || (in == 3)) ? 1 : 0;
00230                 }
00231             }
00232         }
00233     }
00234     quartet.twotwo /= (s_num_spins/4);
00235     quartet.onethree /= (s_num_spins/4);
00236     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 4; site1++) {
00237         quartet.sites[site1] /= (s_num_spins/4);
00238         quartet.sites[site1] *= A_MOMENT;
00239     }
00240     return quartet;
00241 }
00242 MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00243 MonteCarlo::magnetization()
00244 {
00245     Vector3<double> m;
00246     Quartet quartet = siteMagnetization();
00247     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 4; site1++) {
00248         Vector3<double> v(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00249         v *= quartet.sites[site1];
00250         m += v;
00251     }
00252     m *= 1.0/4; // per one spin.
00253     return m;
00254 }
00255 void
00256 MonteCarlo::takeThermalAverage(long double tests_after_check)
00257 {
00258     m_SumDeltaU += m_DeltaU * tests_after_check;
00259 
00260     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00261         m_SumSpin[site] += real(m_spins_rec[site][reciprocal_index(0,0,0)]) * tests_after_check;
00262     }
00263 
00264     m_SumTests += tests_after_check;
00265 }
00266 
00267 double
00268 MonteCarlo::exec(double temp, Vector3<double> field, int *flips,
00269                  long double *tests, double *DUav, Vector3<double> *Mav)
00270 {
00271     m_beta = 1.0/K_B/temp;
00272 
00273     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00274         m_ext_field[site1] = field.innerProduct(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00275     }
00276     
00277     m_DeltaU = 0.0;
00278     m_SumDeltaU = 0.0;
00279     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00280         m_SumSpin[site] = 0.0;
00281     }
00282     m_SumTests = 0.0;
00283     m_SumTestsAtLastFlip = 0.0;
00284     
00285     m_flipHistory.clear();
00286 
00287     doTests(flips, *tests);
00288 
00289     *DUav = m_SumDeltaU / s_num_spins / m_SumTests;
00290     Vector3<double> m;
00291     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00292         Vector3<double> v(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00293         v *= (double)(m_SumSpin[site1]);
00294         m += v;
00295     }
00296     m *= A_MOMENT / s_num_spins / m_SumTests;
00297     *Mav = m;
00298     *tests = m_SumTests;
00299     return m_DeltaU/s_num_spins;
00300 }
00301 inline double
00302 MonteCarlo::flippingProbability(int site, int lidx, double h, double *pdu)
00303 {
00304     int sidx = spins_real_index(lidx);
00305     double du = 2 * readSpin(site, sidx) * A_MOMENT * MU_B * (
00306         h + m_ext_field[site]);
00307     *pdu = du;
00308 
00309     if(du <= 0.0) return 1.0;
00310 
00311     // probability.
00312     return exp(-m_beta*du);
00313 }
00314 long double
00315 MonteCarlo::accelFlipping()
00316 {
00317     //calculate probabilities.
00318     m_sec_cache_enabled = true;
00319 
00320     double sum_p = 0.0;
00321     
00322     int current_buffer;
00323     if(m_last_flipped_lattice_index >= 0) {
00324         // swap buffers.
00325         current_buffer = 1 - m_last_probability_buffer;
00326     }
00327     else {
00328         current_buffer = 0;
00329         m_play_back_buffer = false;
00330     }
00331     if(m_play_back_buffer) {
00332         for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00333             double *pprob = &m_probability_buffers[current_buffer][site1][0];
00334             for(int i = 0; i < s_num_spins/16; i++) {
00335                 sum_p += *(pprob++);
00336             }
00337         }
00338     }
00339     else {
00340         // iterate target site.
00341         for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00342             double *pprob = &m_probability_buffers[current_buffer][site1][0];
00343             int cnt = s_num_spins/16;
00344             for(int lidx = 0; lidx < cnt; lidx++) {
00345                 double h = hinteraction(site1, lidx);
00346                 double du = 0.0;
00347                 double probability = flippingProbability(site1, lidx, h, &du);
00348                 *pprob = probability;
00349                 pprob++;
00350                 sum_p += probability;
00351             }
00352         }
00353     }
00354     m_play_back_buffer = false;
00355     m_last_probability_buffer = current_buffer;
00356     
00357     double p_av = sum_p / s_num_spins;
00358     if(p_av <= 0.0) return -1;
00359     // counts to next flip.
00360     long double cnt_d = ceill(log2l(1.0 - randMT19937()) / log2l((long double)1.0 - p_av));
00361     if(cnt_d <= 0.0) return -1;
00362 //    if(cnt_d > 1e4 * m_spins.size()) return -1;
00363 //    long long int cnt = llrintl(cnt_d);
00364 //    if(cnt == 0) return 0;
00365     // choose target site
00366     double p = randMT19937()*sum_p;
00367     int lidx = s_num_spins/16 - 1;
00368     int site1 = 16;
00369     double pit = 0.0;
00370     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00371         double *pprob = &m_probability_buffers[current_buffer][site][0];
00372         for(int i = 0; i < s_num_spins/16; i++) {
00373             pit += *(pprob++);
00374             if(pit >= p) {
00375                 lidx = i;
00376                 site1 = site;
00377                 break;
00378             }
00379         }
00380         if(pit >= p) break;
00381     }
00382     ASSERT(pit < sum_p * 1.00001);
00383     ASSERT(site1 != 16);
00384     double du = 0.0;
00385     flippingProbability(site1, lidx, hinteraction(site1, lidx), &du);
00386     flipSpin(site1, lidx, du, cnt_d);
00387 //    fprintf(stderr, "Accelerate Flipping done. Skipped tests = %lld\n", cnt);
00388 
00389     if((m_last_flipped_lattice_index == lidx) && (m_last_flipped_site == site1)) {
00390         m_play_back_buffer = true;
00391         fprintf(stderr, "0");
00392     }
00393     else {
00394         if(m_last_flipped_lattice_index >= 0) {
00395             int size = s_L;
00396             int n = lidx;
00397             int i1 = n % size;
00398             n /= size;
00399             int j1 = n % size;
00400             n /= size;
00401             int k1 = n;
00402             n = m_last_flipped_lattice_index;
00403             int i2 = n % size;
00404             n /= size;
00405             int j2 = n % size;
00406             n /= size;
00407             int k2 = n;
00408             VectorInt v = distance(site1, m_last_flipped_site,
00409                                    (i1 - i2 + size) % size, (j1 - j2 + size) % size, (k1 - k2 + size) % size); 
00410             int d = v.x*v.x + v.y*v.y + v.z*v.z;
00411             ASSERT(d > 0);
00412             for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
00413                 if(i == 9) {
00414                     ASSERT(d >= s_4r2_neighbor[i]);
00415                     fprintf(stderr, ".");
00416                     break;
00417                 }
00418                 if(s_4r2_neighbor[i] == d) {
00419                     fprintf(stderr, "%d", i + 1);
00420                     break;
00421                 }
00422             }
00423             if(sum_p > 3.0) {
00424                 // leave accel flipping mode.
00425                 m_last_probability_buffer = -1;
00426             }
00427         }
00428     }
00429     m_last_flipped_lattice_index = lidx;
00430     m_last_flipped_site = site1;
00431     return cnt_d;
00432 }
00433 double
00434 MonteCarlo::internalEnergy() {
00435     bool abondon_cache = (randMT19937() < 0.05);
00436     if(abondon_cache) {
00437         fprintf(stderr, "Abondon cache.\n");
00438         fill(m_field_pri_cached_sane.begin(), m_field_pri_cached_sane.end(), 0);
00439     }
00440     //internal energy. [J/A-site]
00441     double U = 0.0;
00442     // iterate target site.
00443     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00444         for(int lidx = 0; lidx < s_num_spins/16; lidx++) {
00445             double h = 0.0;
00446             h = hinteraction(site1, lidx);
00447             // interacting field must be half.
00448             h *= 0.5;
00449             h += m_ext_field[site1];
00450             U += -readSpin(site1, spins_real_index(lidx)) * A_MOMENT * MU_B * h;
00451         }}
00452     
00453     U /= s_num_spins;
00454     return U;
00455 }
00456 void
00457 MonteCarlo::doTests(int *flips, long double tests)
00458 {
00459     int flipped = 0;
00460     int flipped_checked = 0;
00461     m_sec_cache_hit = 0;
00462     m_third_cache_hit = 0;
00463     m_hinteractions_called = 0;
00464     long tested = 0;
00465     long tests_after_check = 0;
00466     long double tests_accel_flip = 0;
00467     long double tests_accel_flip_started = 0;
00468     int flipped_accel_flip_started = 0;
00469     bool accel_flip = false;
00470     for(;;) {
00471         if((flipped >= *flips) && (m_SumTests + tests_after_check >= tests)) break;
00472         if(s_bAborting) {
00473             fprintf(stderr, "Signal caught! Aborting...\n");
00474             break;
00475         }
00476 
00477         if(accel_flip) {
00478             takeThermalAverage(tests_after_check);
00479             tests_after_check = 0;
00480             long double adv = accelFlipping();
00481             if(adv <= 0) {
00482                 fprintf(stderr, "Spins are completely freezed!.\n");
00483                 break;
00484             }
00485             tests_accel_flip += adv;
00486             flipped++;
00487             if(m_last_probability_buffer < 0) {
00488                 fprintf(stderr, "\nSkipped tests = %Lg. Flipped = %d\n", 
00489                         (long double)(tests_accel_flip - tests_accel_flip_started), flipped - flipped_accel_flip_started);
00490                 accel_flip = false;
00491 //                activateThreading();
00492             }
00493             continue;
00494         }
00495         
00496         // pick-up target spin.
00497         int idx = (int)floor(randMT19937() * s_num_spins);
00498 
00499         int site = idx % 16;
00500         int lidx = idx / 16;
00501         
00502         double h = hinteraction(site, lidx);
00503 
00504         double du = 0.0;
00505         double probability = flippingProbability(site, lidx, h, &du);
00506         
00507         tested++;
00508         tests_after_check++;
00509         
00510         if((probability >= 1) || (randMT19937() < probability)) {
00511             flipSpin(site, lidx, du, tests_after_check);
00512             tests_after_check = 0;
00513             flipped++;
00514         }
00515         
00516         if((tested % s_num_spins == 0) && (tested != 0)) {
00517             int flips = flipped - flipped_checked;
00518             
00519             if(flips <= 0) {
00520                 fprintf(stderr, "Flipping Acceleration...");
00521                 accel_flip = true;
00522                 tests_accel_flip_started = tests_accel_flip;
00523                 flipped_accel_flip_started = flipped;
00524                 m_last_flipped_lattice_index = -1;
00525             }
00526 
00527             if(m_third_cache_enabled) {
00528                 if(m_hinteractions_called > m_sec_cache_hit) {
00529                     double hit_prob = (double)m_third_cache_hit / (m_hinteractions_called - m_sec_cache_hit) / 16;
00530                     if(!m_third_cache_firsttime && (hit_prob < THIRD_CACHE_OFF_FACTOR)) {
00531                         m_third_cache_enabled = false;
00532                         for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00533                             fill(m_field_third_cached_sane[i].begin(), m_field_third_cached_sane[i].end(), 0);
00534                         }
00535                         fprintf(stderr, "Flip = %f %%\n", (double)100.0*flips / m_hinteractions_called);
00536                         fprintf(stderr, "Disable 3rd cache. hit = %f%%\n", 100.0*hit_prob);
00537                     }
00538                     m_third_cache_firsttime = false;
00539                 }
00540             }
00541             else {
00542                 double hit_prob_estimate = 
00543                     pow(1.0 - (double)flips / m_hinteractions_called /16 / (s_L*s_L*s_L)
00544                         * (4.0*M_PI/3.0*s_cutoff_real/2*s_cutoff_real/2*s_cutoff_real/2), (double)s_num_spins);
00545                 if(hit_prob_estimate > THIRD_CACHE_ON_FACTOR) {
00546                     m_third_cache_enabled = true;
00547                     m_third_cache_firsttime = true;
00548                     fprintf(stderr, "Flip = %f %%\n", (double)100.0*flips / m_hinteractions_called);
00549                     fprintf(stderr, "Enable 3rd cache. estimate = %f%%\n", 100.0*hit_prob_estimate);
00550                 }
00551             }
00552             m_third_cache_hit = 0;
00553 
00554             if(m_sec_cache_enabled) {
00555                 double hit_prob = (double)m_sec_cache_hit / (m_hinteractions_called) / 16;
00556                 if(!m_sec_cache_firsttime && (hit_prob < SEC_CACHE_OFF_FACTOR)) {
00557                     m_sec_cache_enabled = false;
00558                     for(int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
00559                         fill(m_field_sec_cached_sane[i].begin(), m_field_sec_cached_sane[i].end(), 0);
00560                     }
00561                     fprintf(stderr, "Flip = %f %%\n", (double)100.0*flips / m_hinteractions_called);
00562                     fprintf(stderr, "Disable secondary cache. hit = %f%%\n", 100.0*hit_prob);
00563                 }
00564 //                    fprintf(stderr, "Secondary cache hit = %f%%\n", 100.0*hit_prob);
00565                 m_sec_cache_firsttime = false;
00566             }
00567             else {
00568                 double hit_prob_estimate = 
00569                     pow(1.0 - (double)flips / m_hinteractions_called /16, (double)s_num_spins);
00570                 if(hit_prob_estimate > SEC_CACHE_ON_FACTOR) {
00571                     m_sec_cache_enabled = true;
00572                     m_sec_cache_firsttime = true;
00573                     fprintf(stderr, "Flip = %f %%\n", (double)100.0*flips / m_hinteractions_called);
00574                     fprintf(stderr, "Enable secondary cache. estimate = %f%%\n", 100.0*hit_prob_estimate);
00575                 }
00576             }
00577             m_sec_cache_hit = 0;
00578                         
00579             flipped_checked = flipped;
00580             m_hinteractions_called = 0;
00581         } 
00582     }
00583     if(accel_flip) {
00584         fprintf(stderr, "\nSkipped tests = %Lg. Flipped = %d\n", 
00585                 (long double)(tests_accel_flip - tests_accel_flip_started), flipped - flipped_accel_flip_started);
00586     }
00587     *flips = flipped;
00588     takeThermalAverage(tests_after_check);
00589 }
00590 
00591 inline void
00592 MonteCarlo::modifyReciprocalImage(Spin diff, int site1, int i, int j, int k)
00593 {
00594     int cutoff = s_cutoff_rec;
00595     int cnt = 2*cutoff + 1;
00596     complex<Spin> *pspin = &m_spins_rec[site1][0];
00597     
00598     Vector3<double> pos1(cg_ASitePositions[site1]);
00599     pos1 *= LATTICE_CONST / 4.0;
00600     double phx = -2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (i * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.x);
00601     double phy = -2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (j * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.y);
00602     double phz = -2*M_PI / (LATTICE_CONST * s_L) * (k * LATTICE_CONST + pos1.z);
00603     complex<Spin> exp_i_rx = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phx));
00604     complex<Spin> exp_i_ry = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phy));
00605     complex<Spin> exp_i_rz = exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, phz));
00606         
00607     complex<Spin> exp_ikrz = ((Spin)diff)
00608         * exp(complex<Spin>(0.0, -cutoff * (phx + phy)));
00609     for(int kz = 0; kz <= cutoff; kz++) {
00610         complex<Spin> exp_ikryz = exp_ikrz;
00611         for(int ky = -cutoff; ky <= cutoff; ky++) {
00612             complex<Spin> exp_ikr = exp_ikryz;
00613             for(int n = 0; n < cnt; n++) {
00614                 pspin[n] += exp_ikr;
00615                 exp_ikr *= exp_i_rx;
00616             }
00617             pspin+=cnt;
00618             exp_ikryz *= exp_i_ry;
00619         }
00620         exp_ikrz *= exp_i_rz;
00621     }
00622     ASSERT(pspin == &*m_spins_rec[site1].end());
00623 }
00624 void
00625 MonteCarlo::makeReciprocalImage()
00626 {
00627     int cutoff = s_cutoff_rec;
00628     if(!cutoff) return;
00629     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00630         m_spins_rec[site].clear();
00631         m_spins_rec[site].resize((2*cutoff+1)*(2*cutoff+1)*(cutoff+1), 0.0);
00632         for(int k = 0; k < s_L; k++) {
00633             for(int j = 0; j < s_L; j++) {
00634                 for(int i = 0; i < s_L; i++) {
00635                     modifyReciprocalImage(readSpin(site, spins_real_index(i,j,k)), site, i, j, k);
00636                 }
00637             }
00638         }
00639     }
00640 }
00641 void
00642 MonteCarlo::flipSpin(int site1, int lidx, double du, long double tests_after_check)
00643 {
00644     takeThermalAverage(tests_after_check);
00645     
00646     m_DeltaU += du;
00647 
00648     int sidx = spins_real_index(lidx);
00649     Spin oldv = readSpin(site1, sidx);
00650     int n = lidx;
00651     int i = n % s_L;
00652     n /= s_L;
00653     int j = n % s_L;
00654     n /= s_L;
00655     int k = n;
00656     modifyReciprocalImage(-2*oldv, site1, i, j, k);
00657     // flip spin. keep repeated image.
00658     writeSpin(-oldv, site1, sidx);
00659     ASSERT(spins_real_index(i,j,k) == sidx);
00660     
00661     FlipHistory hist;
00662     hist.lidx = lidx;
00663     hist.site = site1;
00664     hist.delta = -2*oldv;
00665     hist.tests = (m_SumTests - m_SumTestsAtLastFlip);
00666     m_flipHistory.push_back(hist);
00667     m_SumTestsAtLastFlip = m_SumTests;
00668     
00669     //set dirty flags to caches.
00670     fill(m_field_pri_cached_sane.begin(), m_field_pri_cached_sane.end(), 0);
00671     if(m_sec_cache_enabled) {
00672         fill(m_field_sec_cached_sane[site1].begin(), m_field_sec_cached_sane[site1].end(), 0);
00673     }
00674     if(m_third_cache_enabled) {
00675         int size = s_L;
00676         int dist = s_cutoff_real;
00677         int r2bound = dist*dist;
00678         uint16_t *p0 = &m_field_third_cached_sane[site1][0];
00679         for(int dk = -dist; dk <= dist; dk++) {
00680             int dk2 = abs(dk) - 1;
00681             dk2 = dk2*dk2;
00682             uint16_t *p_k = p0 + lattice_index(0, 0, (k + dk + size) % size);
00683             for(int dj = -dist; dj <= dist; dj++) {
00684                 int dj2 = abs(dj) - 1;
00685                 dj2 = dk2 + dj2*dj2;
00686                 uint16_t *p_j = p_k + lattice_index(0, (j + dj + size) % size, 0);
00687                 for(int di = -dist; di <= dist; di++) {
00688                     int di2 = abs(di) - 1;
00689                     int r2 = dj2 + di2*di2;
00690                     if(r2 <= r2bound) {
00691                         p_j[lattice_index((i + di + size) % size, 0, 0)] = 0;
00692                     }
00693                 }
00694             }
00695         }
00696     }
00697     
00698 }
00699 void
00700 MonteCarlo::write(char *data, double *fields, double *probabilities)
00701 {
00702     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00703         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00704             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00705                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00706                     *(data++) = lrint(readSpin(site, spins_real_index(i1,j1,k1)));
00707                     if(fields) {
00708                         int lidx = lattice_index(i1,j1,k1);
00709                         double h = hinteraction(site, lidx);
00710                         *(fields++) = h;
00711                         if(probabilities) {
00712                             double du;
00713                             double probability = flippingProbability(site, lidx, h, &du);
00714                             *(probabilities++) = probability;
00715                         }
00716                     }
00717                 }
00718             }
00719         }
00720     }
00721 }
00722 void
00723 MonteCarlo::write_bsite(Vector3<double> *fields)
00724 {
00725     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00726         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00727             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00728                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00729                     Vector3<double> h;
00730                     h += iterate_real_generic(s_fields_real_B[site], i1, j1, k1);
00731                     Vector3<double> pos(cg_BSitePositions[site]);
00732                     pos *= 1.0/4.0;
00733                     h += iterate_rec_generic(pos, i1, j1, k1);
00734                     *(fields++) = h;
00735                 }
00736             }
00737         }
00738     }
00739 }

00748                     h += iterate_real_generic(s_fields_real_8a[site], i1, j1, k1);
00749                     Vector3<double> pos(cg_8aSitePositions[site]);
00750                     pos *= 1.0/8.0;
00751                     h += iterate_rec_generic(pos, i1, j1, k1);
00752                     *(fields++) = h;
00753                 }
00754             }
00755         }
00756     }
00757 }

00759 MonteCarlo::write_48fsite(Vector3<double> *fields)

00767                     Vector3<double> pos(cg_48fSitePositions[site]);
00768                     pos *= 1.0/8.0;

00770                     *(fields++) = h;
00771                 }
00772             }
00773         }
00774     }
00775 }
00776 void
00777 MonteCarlo::write_flips(std::deque<FlipHistory> &buf) {
00778     buf.resize(m_flipHistory.size());
00779     std::copy(m_flipHistory.begin(), m_flipHistory.end(), buf.begin());
00780 }
00781 
00782 void
00783 MonteCarlo::read(const char *data, double temp, Vector3<double> field)
00784 {
00785     m_beta = 1.0/K_B/temp;
00786 
00787     for(int site1 = 0; site1 < 16; site1++) {
00788         m_ext_field[site1] = field.innerProduct(s_ASiteIsingVector[site1]);
00789     }
00790     
00791     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00792         for(int k1 = 0; k1 < s_L; k1++) {
00793             for(int j1 = 0; j1 < s_L; j1++) {
00794                 for(int i1 = 0; i1 < s_L; i1++) {
00795                     writeSpin(*(data++), site, spins_real_index(i1,j1,k1));
00796                 }
00797             }
00798         }
00799         if(m_sec_cache_enabled)
00800             fill(m_field_sec_cached_sane[site].begin(), m_field_sec_cached_sane[site].end(), 0);
00801         if(m_third_cache_enabled)
00802             fill(m_field_third_cached_sane[site].begin(), m_field_third_cached_sane[site].end(), 0);
00803     }
00804     fill(m_field_pri_cached_sane.begin(), m_field_pri_cached_sane.end(), 0);
00805     makeReciprocalImage();
00806 }
